Articles.Content:
I am currently working on making parts, and hopefully I'll become good enough to make a part pack that's popular.

However, this isn't the case yet, so I have decided to ask for a bit of help from the community.

If anyone would like to help me out and texture this model for me, I'd be very thankful (I'm just bad at texturing in general ).

If you are interested in helping me out, PM me or leave a post, and I'll give you the model along with the UV maps of the model.

(EDIT) Changed from pictures to a 3d model of the engine.

Please leave a post if you're interested texturing this for me,

Thanks!

Edited August 1, 2013 by Mr.Desmond Tiny
I really suck at texturing, but that is a nice looking model. Good work!
Yeah that is a nice model. I'll texture it for you if you make a good enough UV map.

I'll give you the UV maps, considering this is only my third part, and I am a beginner myself

Please note that I won't have it up until tomorrow, considering that I am busy with my life outside of gaming, so in case you are wondering,

that's why.

And again, thanks for deciding to do this for me!

(EDIT)

I'll texture it for you if you make a good enough UV map.

I'll make you UV models that I think will be the easiest for you to texture, but there a few different choices for making a UV map,

so if you don't like the UV map, I'll change it so it will be easier for you.

Edited July 31, 2013 by Mr.Desmond Tiny
